languages.text: "Кибелла... Бедная девчонка. Служение дважды лишило ее семьи".
"Kibellah... Poor girl. That is now twice that her service has robbed her of family."
languages.original_text: "Кибелла... Бедная девчонка. Служение дважды лишило ее семьи".

traits.locale_text: "Kibellah... Poor girl. Twice has her service robbed her of family."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Kibellah ... Das arme Mädchen. Nun hat ihr Dienst sie schon zum zweiten Mal ihrer Familie beraubt."
languages.original_text: "Kibellah... Poor girl. That is now twice that her service has robbed her of family."

traits.locale_text: "Kibellah ... Das arme Mädchen. Nun hat ihr Dienst sie schon zum zweiten Mal ihrer Familie beraubt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Pauvre Kibellah... C'est la deuxième fois déjà que sa mission lui coûte sa famille. »
languages.original_text: "Kibellah... Poor girl. That is now twice that her service has robbed her of family."

traits.locale_text: « Pauvre Kibellah... C'est la deuxième fois déjà que sa mission lui coûte sa famille. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Kibellah... pobre muchacha. Van dos veces que su servicio la despoja de su familia».
languages.original_text: "Kibellah... Poor girl. That is now twice that her service has robbed her of family."

traits.locale_text: «Kibellah... pobre muchacha. Van dos veces que su servicio la despoja de su familia».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「キベラ…可哀相に。これで二度、兵役で家族を奪われたことになる」
languages.original_text: "Kibellah... Poor girl. That is now twice that her service has robbed her of family."

traits.locale_text: 「キベラ…可哀相に。これで二度、兵役で家族を奪われたことになる」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “绮贝菈……可怜的姑娘，她的使命再次夺走了她的家人。”
languages.original_text: "Kibellah... Poor girl. That is now twice that her service has robbed her of family."

traits.locale_text: “绮贝菈……可怜的姑娘，她的使命再次夺走了她的家人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
